item.title: Creative coding and generative art
item.description: Here you can see some of my works in domain of visual and interactive art. Most of the projects are in openFrameworks. (some are in Max, vvvv or TouchDesigner) 3D Meshez openFrameworks Random object creation Unity Dithering algorithm openFrameworks Recreating some old PS1 Demo openFrameworks 3D interactive noise vvvv Pixelsorting openFrameworks Generative box design TouchDesigner
